name: Prestidigitation
description: A flicker of raw arcane potential performs tiny tasks at your command. Choose one effect within range: ignite or snuff a small flame; clean or smudge an object no larger than 1 cubic foot; chill, warm, or subtly flavor nonliving material; shift the color of a palm-sized surface; conjure a harmless handâ€‘held trinket that vanishes at the start of your next turn; or create a brief sensory flourish such as a drifting spark, soft chime, or fleeting scent.
